name: MyAnimeList - Simple Grey
description: A simple grey-ish style for MyAnimeList.net
additional_info: A list style in the same theme is available here. History: 1.1.2 - Support MAL SSL + Fixes/improvements for footer 1.1.1 - Update style to change hosting of images 1.1.0 - Support more of the new additions. 1.0.0 - first release
